Name: Michael Delizo
Content: WATCH: The Philippine National Police on Wednesday, May 7, activated the National Election Monitoring Action Center for real-time monitoring and coordination with all PNP units nationwide to ensure the orderly conduct of the mid-term polls. #Halalan2025 #SelfiePatrol

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
If Kiko does not do well in 2025, I hope he would at least give 2028 a chance.

Akala nga natin deds na ang Senate career ni Tito Sotto nung nag-#19 in 2007, malayong-malayo sa #1 in 1992 & #3 in 1998.

And yet, nakabawi siya, at ngayon, makakapag-5th term pa nga.#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
I hope rabid Kakampinks are happy now kasi unti-unti na itong nagkakatotoo.

Enjoy the impending Philip Salvador presidency. #Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
As long as Senate elections in the Philippines are conducted this way, this is gonna keep going on and on and on.

Popularity and name recognition trumps everything else. And if Phillip Salvador wins this year, he's practically guaranteed a 12-year term as Senator.#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
In Cebu, Governor Gwen Garcia has endorsed the following admin Senate bets:

-Abalos
-Bong Revilla
-Cayetano
-Lacson
-Pacquiao 
-Sotto-Tolentino
-Villar

Unclear if she plans to endorse Binay, Lapid, & Erwin Tulfo, or goes for KikoBam and/or pro-Duterte bets.#Halalan2025

Name: Linedun
Content: Ang pagboto kay Philip Salvador at Willie Revillame this 2025 ay senyales na di tayo natuto kay Robin Padilla noong 2022. Para tayong sirang plaka, paulit-ulit na lang. Nakakainit ng ulo. #VoteWisely this May. #Halalan2025

Susmaryosep Pilipinas.

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Out of the 21 Senator-Judges who served in the Estrada impeachment trial, seven later became Senator-Judges in the Corona impeachment trial. (Defensor-Santiago, Drilon, Enrile, Honasan, Legarda, Serge Osmeña, Sotto)

Only Legarda is an incumbent.#Halalan2025 #ImpeachSaraDuterte

Name: Kulotissima
Content:
Pag Tuta ni Duterte, Tuta ng China.
The Senate under Tito Sotto’s embarrassing leadership caved to Duterte. 

Kulang na lang kumahol na parang mga aso ang karamihan ng mga nakaupong Senador noong panahon ni Duterte. 

Huwag iboto ang  mga Hudas na ‘to.#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Ganito rin ang logic ng tito ko sa Mindanao.

Kapag may nagsasabi na nabudol sila, ang response naman niya ay nabudol nga sila kasi kasabwat daw ng "dilawan" ang nasa pwesto ngayon.

So yes, "Nabudol" isn't exactly the flex some might think it is.#Halalan2025
